content.text: Hi, I'm [name]. I work at McDonald's, but I'm considering going to college.
Hi [name], I'm [name]. I'm worried about the environment.
Because I'm concerned about the future of our planet. I think we need to do more to protect it.
I agree. I think we need to be more responsible about the way we live.
I think so too. I'm trying to do my part by making my own clothing and using less plastic.
That's great! I'm trying to do the same thing. I've also started taking public transportation more often.
That's awesome! We should start a club or something.
That's a great idea! We could meet up every week and talk about ways we can protect the environment.
That would be fun! I'd love to do that.
Great! I'll start looking into it.
Awesome! Thanks for talking to me about this.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about environmental issues.
